checkUpkeep(bytes).details: This function does the chainlink automation nodes call to see if its time to perform an upkeep! the folowing should be true to run: 1)The time interval should have been passed betwween Raffle Runs  2) The Raffle is in OPEN State 3) The contract has ETH(players) 4)The subscription should be funded with link!

documentation.text:
@dev This function does the chainlink automation nodes call to see if its time to perform an upkeep!
 the folowing should be true to run:
 1)The time interval should have been passed betwween Raffle Runs 
 2) The Raffle is in OPEN State
 3) The contract has ETH(players)
 4)The subscription should be funded with link!
